Meg gasped as she felt soft lips touch her shaven flesh. After this kiss, Nea stroked across the centre gently, with the gentle approach of a gourmet preparing a meal. A tongue ran down, and up, and down again in a careful motion. With this lubrication now applied, hands grasped Meg's thighs, swiftly spreading them farther. Retracting her mouth, Nea was seeking out a sweet spot. Being careful in her search, she knew she had found it when she heard a low, anxious whimper. This manual pleasing went on until a wetness began to form on the makeshift cushion beneath her. Allowing Meg time to adjust, Nea began the next phase of her stimulation.

Nea had a reputation for her dexterity, and the same proved true for her technique, as her tongue lightly danced around Meg's... imagine reading this far... get some help!

Dead By Broken Game... Fix one thing break 3 others. I can go endlessly about how bad this game can be. But looping brings this game from a 2/10 to a passable grade. Good job DBD very cool
The matchmaking is currently awful. I'm not a great player, so I'll often get crushed by a team with literally 10x the hours I have.. EACH.

After many years of the game being a roller-a-coaster of unbalanced, the Devs found the ultimate way to kill the game for both Killer and Survivor. With the new SBMM (aka MMR), the game has become completely no more fun, killers have to play sweaty and tunnel or camp to get even a single or double kill at average ranks, and if survivors don't gen rush, no ones getting out. My friends and I have all been looking for a new game to play together as we collectively stop playing DBD. My opinion is don't bother spending you money on this game.
This game blows takes forever to get a game

Este con el otro juego de viernes 13 (Perdón pero no recuerdo si ese era el nombre oh no) Son los mejores juego (PARA MI) de terror, tensión o para jugadores que les encanta los juegos tipo Halloween, si lo que buscas es tensión te recomiendo este juego, aparte que en halloween lo rebajan a 9 dólares, a comparación de otros que llegan con rabajas de 15-20 dólares dependiendo del juego.
It is fun that is it, thats all you get nothing else

Great game when playing with friends, I just feel like some killers are a bit OP, but the main thing I would want changed is the fact that the killers can body guard. This game has been out for how long, and the developers haven't fixed the one thing that can make their game go from great to amazing? Overall a good game, but again, the body guarding issue should be dealt with.

Absolutely epic, alot of hackers higherup cuz of bad anti cheat though, also hard to get alot of killers without a pretty penny. 
Edit: I am too far into Dead by Daylight as of right now. The original review is correct but dbd is way too addicting.
its a good game some bugs but good
这个游戏有什么好玩的？“我玩巴布”

The current state of the game makes it hard to recommend this game to others. There's a huge influx of hackers/cheaters that can completely ruin a match by their existence. There's a current issue where people can get your IP from DBD and use it to DDoS you or even worse SWAT you. Neither of these issues have even been addressed by the devs and there's no telling when they will be fixed.

The devs also have very questionable balancing decisions since they focus too hard on creating a perfect average of 2 kills & 2 escapes. As a result, at a certain point your personal skill stops to be the deciding factor and it comes down to many of the rng spawns on the map.

Take a deep breath... and don't punch your monitor. 
I hope you have a will of iron, cuz you're going to need it. That is all.
The game is a lot of fun when you're not up against hackers/cheaters. I do recommend the game though!

Un bon jeu pour les amateurs de film d'horreur, les tueurs et les capacités sont assez variés avec certains venant de franchises telle qu'Halloween ou Les griffes de la nuit.

Les deux seuls mauvais points à mon gout sont : 
-l'équilibrage, qui est clairement en faveur des survivants
-le grind nécessaire pour avoir assez de point pour monter le ou les personnages que vous aimez

This game sucks shit from a straw. Always breaking and giving errors in some way that gets me kicked out of lobbies with my friends because of missing files and no amount of file verification can fix it. What a waste of money.

Re-installing it rn. Was pretty fun with friends back in '20.
I hate Ghostface,

Quite like it, despite quite a few drawbacks. It looks pretty good and has a lot of horror icons which I can appreciate. Gameplay is a bit of a mixed bag, sometimes it can be a ton of fun, other times it can just be downright boring and painful to endure, depends on the people I guess. Does tend to fall into a lot of the same pitfalls as most online competitive games, with egregious amounts of DLC and paid content. Somewhat unfair too that the game is already paid for before you buy any DLC. 

6/10

Don't buy this game. Or any of the current DLC anymore.

It had it's moment; that moment is gone. There won't be anymore of them. 

People wonder why popular youtubers who play(ed) this game don't post anymore killer gameplay; it's unfun.

Maybe you could have a total of an hour of fun as a survivor, but the other side is quite literally NEVER having fun.

Just don't waste your time and wait for VHS to come out. Or get into a different game genre. 

Just don't get this one.
